description.en: Retrieve information about a specific object on the Sui blockchain by its object ID.
description.de: Rufe Informationen Ã¼ber ein bestimmtes Objekt auf der Sui-Blockchain anhand seiner Objekt-ID ab.
Die Objekt-ID, die abgefragt werden soll.

output.OBJECT_TYPE: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.OBJECT_DATA; return data?.data?.type || data?.type || 'Unknown'; }
output.OBJECT_OWNER: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.OBJECT_DATA; const owner = data?.data?.owner || data?.owner; if (typeof owner === 'object' && owner.AddressOwner) return owner.AddressOwner; if (typeof owner === 'object' && owner.Shared) return 'Shared'; return owner || 'Unknown'; }
output.OBJECT_VERSION: transform:() => { const data = results._DATA || results.OBJECT_DATA; return data?.data?.version || data?.version || '0'; }
